Of course\, there's time and place for the light\, cheery and fun ones\, but then there's a NEED in this world for these types too.An educational\, masterfully crafted and ingeniously told tale that makes you think. Not only in the logical sense\, but in an emotional one - and the story is really not about the characters we see. It's about US\, about YOU - it uncovers a great deal about how you handle those situations and emotions it depicts. I think this is why some people hated it so badly\, because this game made them FEEL strongly\, and they couldn't work through their feelings (yet).The reason I feel the opposite\, strongly positive way about it\, is because of the success of being able to work through it\, and gain a deeper understanding not just about the characters\, but about myself (and others around me) too. I actually feel\, that this game made me a better person\, even if just a notch or two\, and I'm glad about that!Emotional work is rewarding\, and those who are willing to put in the time and attention will surely get something out of it. It is dark\, brutal\, and so very lifelike and brave. I'm holding it an etalon of storytelling in (this genre of) videogames.… Expand
